title: Unable to Patch
body: Is anyone else unable to patch today?

replies.body:
Can check this thread for more info if you are still having problems:
https://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/X6V5Znfk-error-code-003-13th-june-2018

Someone else found a solution: 

> C: > Riot Games > League of Legends > RADS > projects > lol_game_client

In that folder, delete the folder named "releases." After that, try launching your game again. Mine just finished patching fine.
